label: Photon Persistent Disk params
helptext: Parameters for Photon Persistent Disk Volume

subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: pdID
subfields.label: Photon Controller ID
subfields.helptext: ID that identifies Photon Controller persistent disk.
